entry.def: A physicist is a person who does research connected with physics or who studies physics.

Sentence.sentence: Maybe there is an Einstein out there today," said Columbia University physicist Brian Greene, "but it would be a lot harder for him to be heard.
No physicist is likely to surpass Einstein in the next 200 years
Many physicists say the next Einstein hasn't been born yet, or is a baby now.
